unnormalised: Bore, tuka stock marketant bhitor sorun gheunk zai, haina? Poilech pavtt dhomkyachi dista, punn mandeak tallelear cycle cholouche bhaxen. Tum kaim pavtti poddttolim, punn nimannem tumka adgalta. Mhaka konnem tor sangpak zai aslo poilea suruvat kel'lea vellar: tum Whatsapp forwardsant dista tea soglleacher visvas dovrunk nant! Choddxe "tips" mhunntlear lok apli sompotti vaddoucheak stock dhortat. Badlek tum tuji svotaichi sodh lav. Company report vacha, business model somza ani P/E ratio bhaxeleank polya. Tum fuddem sorun "XYZ Ltd" Rs. 500 meren gheunchea vorvim Rakesh-an tumka sanglo mhunnu fuddem sorun gheunk nant – tem ek opghatachi reseep.
normalised: Borem, tumka stock market-ant bhitor soronk zai, hã? Poilea pavttim bhirantikar disunk xokta, punn khorench, tem ek bicycle choloupak xikpachem bhaxen asa. Tum thodde pavtti poddonk xoktat, punn nimannem tumka tachi vollokh zateli. Mhojem ek vostu jinnhem mhaka sangonk zai aslem jevh mhanv suru kelem: W-H-A-T-S-A-P-P forwards-ancher tum vachitat tem sogllem khorem manunk naka! Choddxe "tips" fokot lok aapnne kodden asa tea stocks-anchem voddop korpak proitn kortat. Tech bodlek, tumchem svotachem research korat. Company reports vachat, business model somzun gheiat, ani P slash E ratio bhaxen vostuncher nodor marat. Tumcho ixtt Rakesh-an tumka "X-Y-Z Limited" rupee panch xenkddeant vikto gheunk sanglam mhunnon uchkol marunk naka – tem ek ibaddachem resepi zatolem.

unnormalised: Stock marketant invest korop mhunntlear ek thali order koruche bhaxen – tumka veg-veglleancho mix zai. Tumche soglle andde eka basketant dovrunk nant, tech bhaxen te sangtat. IT, pharma, ani finance bhaxelea veg-veglea sectorant tumchem portfolio diversify kor. Mutual fundsant invest korucheak vichar korunk zata tum navin asat zalear. Tankam professionals choloitat, ani tum Rs. 1000 vorvim suruvat korunk zatat dar mhoinea SIP (Systematic Investment Plan) vorvim. Tem ek boro upay tumche paie bhijoucheak kiteak mhunnlear suruwatik chodd risk ghenastana.
normalised: Stock market-ant invest korop ek thalli ordder korpa bhaxen asa – tumka vegvegllea vostunchem mix zai. Soglle tumche andde ekach tokrent dovrunk naka, teman sangtat tea bhaxen. Tumchem portfolio vegvegllea sectors-ant diversify korat jese I-T, pharma, ani finance. Tum mutual funds-ant invest korpak vichar korunk xoktat tum nove asat zalear hea gamen. Te professionals-an cholovpant yeta, ani tum lhan amount-an suru korunk xoktat jese rupee ek hozar dor mhoineak S-I-P (Systematic Investment Plan) thorun. Tem ek bori rit tumche paay ovle korpak chodd risk ghevnastanam poile pavttim.

unnormalised: Aata, tum aikuchim kaim common termancher uloya. "Sensex" ani "Nifty" mahatvachi indices zankam marketachi performance dista. "IPO" mhunntlear Initial Public Offering, mhunnlear jevha company poilech pavtt apli shares lokank offer korta. Ani yad dovortat, brokerage charges tumcho faido khaunk xaktat, dekhun Demat account ugte korchea poile veg-veglea brokerank compare korat. Kaim lower rates offer kortat, Rs. 20 per trade bhaxen, tor dusre transaction valuechi percentage gheunk xaktat.
normalised: Atam, thodde common terms-ancher uloumya je tum chodd aiktole. "Sensex" ani "Nifty" mhathvache indices asat je pure market performance dakhoitat. "I-P-O" mhunllear Initial Public Offering, jevh ek company poile pavttim aapnne stocks publicak offer korta. Ani ugddas dovrat, brokerage charges tumcho faido khauunk xoktat, teman vegvegllea brokers-anchem compare korat Demat account ugddchea adim. Kaim zanna kam rate offer kortat, jese rupee vis dor trade-ak, dusre transaction value-chem percentage charge kortole.

unnormalised: Nimannem, lamb-kallache drishti dovrat. Stock market dolta – tem sadharan. Market khala poddttoch bhirantichea khala vikrunk nant, ani jednam tem vaddta tednam lobh korunk nant. Tem sompti vaddouche bhaxen vichaar korat, ambieachem zadd lavouche bhaxen. Tem dhir ani samball gheta, punn nimannem tum tumchea kamacho faido ghetale (dividends!). Tumka adgal zata zalear financial advisor kodden vichar korunk yad dovrat. Tankam tumchi risk tolerance ani financial goal zoddoucheak ek plan toyar korunk madat korunk zatali. Shubhechha!
normalised: Nimannem, lamb kallachem vichar dovrat. Stock market fluctuate zatolem – tem normal asa. Market khala yeta tea velar ghabron vikunk naka, ani lobhi zaunk naka jevh tem vaddoita. Tem ek kallan girestkay bandhpa bhaxen vichar korat, ek ambeachem zhadd rovnpa bhaxen. Tem dhir ani kallji gheunk zai, punn nimannem tum tumchea kashttache fale faide (va dividends!) bhogtole. Ugddas dovrat tum eka financial advisor-achem salah gheiat tumka personalized guidance zai zalear. Te tumka ek plan toyar korpak mhot korunk xoktat je tumche risk tolerance ani financial goals-ank milta. Soglleach borea bhavna!
